title: My First Projects
shortDesciprition: My first projects were simple plugins for the game Minecraft. Therefore, the first programming language I learned was Java and it still is one of my favorite languages today.

title: Melion - The first Milestone
shortDesciprition: Melion was a Minecraft project I worked on from July 2020 to Februrary 2021. Even if this is a relatively short time, I learned much about coding principles and also found my way into web development.

title: Venterion - Another Minecraft Project
shortDesciprition: After I quit Melion, I started the Venterion project with friends. I was responsible for managing the projects and leading the development team. I got the most experience in server administration and devops from here.

title: Metahond Development - Welcome to the Web
shortDesciprition: I lost the interest in developing Minecraft plugins more and more. A friend if mine, Fl4wless, was also interested in web development and we started to create a new project together: Metahond.

title: Hondicard - Metahond's Debut
shortDesciprition: After learning the basics, we started working on our first project: Hondicard. We are still working on it and we made huge progress since we started working on it.
